00014 std::vector<std::string>& split(const std::string &string, char delimiter, std::vector<std::string> &elements){
00015     std::stringstream stringStream(string);
00016     std::string item;
00017 
00018     while(std::getline(stringStream, item, delimiter)){
00019         std::stringstream trimmer;
00020         trimmer << item;
00021         trimmer >> item;
00022         elements.push_back(item);
00023     }
00024     return elements;
00025 }

00027 std::string& replaceAll(std::string &string, std::string toFind, std::string replacement){
00028     size_t pos = string.find(toFind);
00029     while(pos!=std::string::npos){
00030         string.replace(pos,toFind.length(),replacement);
00031         pos = string.find(toFind);
00032     }
00033     return string;
00034 }

00036 void addPath(cPar &parameter, std::string &pathToAdd){
00037     std::string path = parameter.stdstringValue();
00038     if(path.length()>0)
00039         path.append(",");
00040     path.append(pathToAdd);
00041     parameter.setStringValue(path);
00042 }
00043 
00044 cGate* gateByFullPath(std::string &path){
00045     std::size_t pos = path.rfind('.');
00046     if(pos!=std::string::npos){
00047         std::string modulePath = path.substr(0,pos);
00048         std::string gateName = path.substr(pos+1);
00049         cModule* module = cSimulation::getActiveSimulation()->getModuleByPath(modulePath.c_str());
00050         if(module){
00051             return module->gate(gateName.c_str());
00052         }
00053     }
00054     return NULL;
00055 }
00056 
00057 unsigned int getTotalDelay(EtherFrame *frame){
00058     cArray parlist = frame->getParList();
00059 
00060     long start = -1;
00061     long end = -1;
00062     unsigned int delay = 0;
00063 
00064     for(int i=0;i<parlist.size();i++){
00065         cMsgPar *parameter = dynamic_cast<cMsgPar*>(parlist.get(i));
00066         if(parameter){
00067             if(strncmp(parameter->getName(),"received_total",15)==0 || strncmp(parameter->getName(),"created_total",15)==0){
00068                 start = parameter->longValue();
00069             }
00070             else if(strncmp(parameter->getName(),"sent_total",11)==0 && start>=0){
00071                 end = parameter->longValue();
00072             }
00073 
00074             if(start >= 0 && end >= 0){
00075                 delay += end - start;
00076                 start = -1;
00077                 end = -1;
00078             }
00079         }
00080     }
00081     return delay;
00082 }
00083 
00084 unsigned int getLocalDelay(EtherFrame *frame){
00085     cArray parlist = frame->getParList();
00086 
00087     long start = -1;
00088     long end = -1;
00089 
00090     for(int i=0;i<parlist.size();i++){
00091         cMsgPar *parameter = dynamic_cast<cMsgPar*>(parlist.get(i));
00092         if(parameter){
00093             if(strncmp(parameter->getName(),"received_total",15)==0 || strncmp(parameter->getName(),"created_total",15)==0){
00094                 start = parameter->longValue();
00095             }
00096             else if(strncmp(parameter->getName(),"sent_total",11)==0){
00097                 end = parameter->longValue();
00098             }
00099         }
00100     }
00101     if(start >= 0 && end >= 0){
00102         return end-start;
00103     }
00104     return 0;
00105 }
